Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication

Class ConnectionToClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.utils.observe.Observable<java.lang.Object>
it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication.ConnectionToClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ConnectionToClient
extends Observable<java.lang.Object>
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class manages the connection to a client using a socket

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int CONNECTION_TIMEOUT  
    static int PING_PERIOD  
    static int TIMEOUT_BEFORE_CLOSE  
    static int TIMER_LONG  
    static int TIMER_SHORT  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ConnectionToClient​(java.net.Socket socket)
    The constructor of the connection saves the client socket in a local variable, saves also a reference to the server connection utils

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askForDesiredPlayersAndGamemode()
    Method use by the server to ask the client the desired number of players in a match and if it wants to play in hardcore mode or not, also starts a shorter timer Upon failure retrieving the information, closes the connection
    void askNicknameAgain()
    Method use by the server to ask the client his nickname again because it has already been selected by another player Upon failure retrieving the information, closes the connection, also starts a shorter timer
    void asyncCloseRoutine()
    This method starts the closeRoutine method on a new thread
    void closeRoutineFull()
    This method calls the closeRoutine method, additionally handles the full de-registration of the connection according to its state (in lobby or in match)
    java.lang.String getClientNickname()
    Returns the client nickname
    int getDesiredNumOfPlayers()
    Returns the desired number of players of the client
    boolean isActive()
    Returns the active status of the connection
    boolean isDesiredHardcore()
    Returns the desired number gamemode of the client
    void run()
    This is the run method used by the server to start the client After creating the object streams to the client, it asks the desired nickname It loops continuing to listen for incoming objects from the connection and notifies the handlers according to the objects received Upon failure of any kind it closes the connection
    void send​(java.io.Serializable packet, boolean withTimer)
    Method for sending ONLY serialized objects to the client Upon failure sending the information, closes the connection
    void setClosureHandler​(Observer<ConnectionToClient> closureHandler)  
    void setGameDesiresHandler​(Observer<ConnectionToClient> gameDesiresHandler)  
    void setInMatch​(boolean inMatch)  
    void setNickNameChosenHandler​(Observer<ConnectionToClient> nickNameChosenHandler)  
    void stopTimer()
    Stops an eventually running timer

    Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.common.utils.observe.Observable

    addObserver, notify

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ConnectionToClient

      public ConnectionToClient​(java.net.Socket socket)
      The constructor of the connection saves the client socket in a local variable, saves also a reference to the server connection utils
      Parameters:
      socket - the client socket it manages

  • Method Details

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
      Stops an eventually running timer

    • send

      public void send​(java.io.Serializable packet, boolean withTimer)
      Method for sending ONLY serialized objects to the client Upon failure sending the information, closes the connection
      Parameters:
      packet - the serialized object
      withTimer - a flag to activate a longer timer that closes the connection if it doesn't receive an answer within the prescribed time limit

    • askForDesiredPlayersAndGamemode

      public void askForDesiredPlayersAndGamemode()
      Method use by the server to ask the client the desired number of players in a match and if it wants to play in hardcore mode or not, also starts a shorter timer Upon failure retrieving the information, closes the connection

    • askNicknameAgain

      public void askNicknameAgain()
      Method use by the server to ask the client his nickname again because it has already been selected by another player Upon failure retrieving the information, closes the connection, also starts a shorter timer

    • run

      public void run()
      This is the run method used by the server to start the client After creating the object streams to the client, it asks the desired nickname It loops continuing to listen for incoming objects from the connection and notifies the handlers according to the objects received Upon failure of any kind it closes the connection
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • closeRoutineFull

      public void closeRoutineFull()
      This method calls the closeRoutine method, additionally handles the full de-registration of the connection according to its state (in lobby or in match)

    • asyncCloseRoutine

      public void asyncCloseRoutine()
      This method starts the closeRoutine method on a new thread

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns the active status of the connection
      Returns:
      the active flag

    • getDesiredNumOfPlayers

      public int getDesiredNumOfPlayers()
      Returns the desired number of players of the client
      Returns:
      the desired number of players

    • isDesiredHardcore

      public boolean isDesiredHardcore()
      Returns the desired number gamemode of the client
      Returns:
      true if hardcore is desired

    • getClientNickname

      public java.lang.String getClientNickname()
      Returns the client nickname
      Returns:
      the client nickname, null if it hasn't been chosen yet

    • setNickNameChosenHandler

      public void setNickNameChosenHandler​(Observer<ConnectionToClient> nickNameChosenHandler)

    • setGameDesiresHandler

      public void setGameDesiresHandler​(Observer<ConnectionToClient> gameDesiresHandler)

    • setClosureHandler

      public void setClosureHandler​(Observer<ConnectionToClient> closureHandler)

      public void setInMatch​(boolean inMatch)
